content.question: An inscription states that “although to all appearances kings stand before him, he looks inwardly toward the dervishes,” a message that is communicated in the work by

choices.label: placing winged putti above and below the central figure
including the depiction of a man dressed in European clothing
depicting the central figure passing a book to a Sufi as a gift
using specific flowers that symbolize regions of the ruler’s empire

content.answer: depicting the central figure passing a book to a Sufi as a gift
